mapper.select: select r_id, materialcode, materialname, typename, brand, modelname, sitepartname, unitname, numberd, backnumber, unitprice, amountprice, storename, billcode from asms.w_returnedmaterials where r_id = #{rId}

select r_id, materialcode, materialname, typename, brand, modelname, sitepartname, unitname, numberd, backnumber, unitprice, amountprice, storename, billcode from asms.w_returnedmaterials limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into asms.w_returnedmaterials(materialcode, materialname, typename, brand, modelname, sitepartname, unitname, numberd, backnumber, unitprice, amountprice, storename, billcode) values (#{materialcode}, #{materialname}, #{typename}, #{brand}, #{modelname}, #{sitepartname}, #{unitname}, #{numberd}, #{backnumber}, #{unitprice}, #{amountprice}, #{storename}, #{billcode})

insert into asms.w_returnedmaterials(materialcode, materialname, typename, brand, modelname, sitepartname, unitname, numberd, backnumber, unitprice, amountprice, storename, billcode) values
(#{entity.materialcode}, #{entity.materialname}, #{entity.typename}, #{entity.brand}, #{entity.modelname}, #{entity.sitepartname}, #{entity.unitname}, #{entity.numberd}, #{entity.backnumber}, #{entity.unitprice}, #{entity.amountprice}, #{entity.storename}, #{entity.billcode})

insert into asms.w_returnedmaterials(materialcode, materialname, typename, brand, modelname, sitepartname, unitname, numberd, backnumber, unitprice, amountprice, storename, billcode) values
(#{entity.materialcode}, #{entity.materialname}, #{entity.typename}, #{entity.brand}, #{entity.modelname}, #{entity.sitepartname}, #{entity.unitname}, #{entity.numberd}, #{entity.backnumber}, #{entity.unitprice}, #{entity.amountprice}, #{entity.storename}, #{entity.billcode})
on duplicate key update materialcode = values(materialcode) , materialname = values(materialname) , typename = values(typename) , brand = values(brand) , modelname = values(modelname) , sitepartname = values(sitepartname) , unitname = values(unitname) , numberd = values(numberd) , backnumber = values(backnumber) , unitprice = values(unitprice) , amountprice = values(amountprice) , storename = values(storename) , billcode = values(billcode)
mapper.update:
update asms.w_returnedmaterials
materialcode = #{materialcode},
materialname = #{materialname},
typename = #{typename},
brand = #{brand},
modelname = #{modelname},
sitepartname = #{sitepartname},
unitname = #{unitname},
numberd = #{numberd},
backnumber = #{backnumber},
unitprice = #{unitprice},
amountprice = #{amountprice},
storename = #{storename},
billcode = #{billcode},
where r_id = #{rId}
